title: Iheart radio
content:
The latest version of Firefox broke Iheart radio. I can't listen live on any station. I have tried 4 different computers with the same result. I tried 2 computers with an earlier version of Firefox and it works fine. I tried Google Chrome and it works fine.

Here a link:

https://www.iheart.com/live/news-radio-740-ktrh-2285/?pname=15400&campid=header&cid=%2Ffeatured%2Fshara-fryer%2Fcontent%2F2018-02-20-girls-road-trip%2F
creator: johngiaconia

title: Yahoo redirect malware
content: Hi, I keep getting the Yahoo redirect malware no matter how many times I reset my search settings and remove both Yahoo and "Browser default" search engine back to Google. I have read extensively about this problem, and it seems that the only solution is temporary. Any time I take my laptop to a different location (and thus use a different internet connection), my search settings are undone and the Yahoo redirect function is restored. Please help!! I have tried to run antivirus / anti-spyware software, but my Apple Chip Macbook Air 2020 is incompatible with a lot of existing software. Thanks!
creator: chobrooklyn

title: Firefox suggesting deleted bookmarks
content:
Firefox keeps suggesting deleted bookmarks when I type in the address/search bar. Bookmarks I deleted 5+ months ago.

I have removed the bookmarks from all my computers and phones. I reset my firefox account. Completely deleted the Firefox application and sub-files and folders from computers and mobile and re-installed fresh and clean copies and the deleted bookmarks are still sugested. Even installed on a completely new PC and they still come up.

I have rechecked my bookmark lists and they are not in there.

Any help on how to stop firefox recommending deleted bookmarks would be very helpful.

Thanks R
creator: rcranfie

title: Unable to sync firefox PC to android phone
content:
I am not a geek and I follow all the details of 'how to etc etc' but nothing works and the phone goes into random loops and keeps telling my I cannot sync (I KNOW that). Firefox has no phone number or email system for technical support (or any type of support) just this hit and miss system of 'forums' (or is that fora). I tried to send a bug report but I am NOT signing up for another (geek speak) account just to send you the problem. Please fix this issue - it never used to happen on older versions - how can I roll back my firefox to something that works properly?? title: bookmorks will not fully import from html file
content: I have tried to install fire fox over 5 times, it will not fully import bookmark html file. Can I copy and paste the file to the fire fox folder? The Microsoft edge browser took the bookmark file with no problems, I want to go back to fire fox. I am running a new windows 11 pro intel based i9 system.
creator: garycolvin

title: 103 update breaks video playback.
content:
Both Youtube, gfy, reddit, or playing any mp4 in browser becomes erratic, sometimes it wants to work, sometimes it doesn't. Simple as explained.

Twice I did a w10 system restore back to v.102 and playback is normal. Twice i update to 103, and playback becomes botched. sometimes videos work, sometimes they don't, no loading, then sometimes background loading for minutes but no play, very random, very erratic.

So now i have 103 update blocked to avoid this problem.
creator: foraten217

title: Firefox opening in small window
content:
Firefox is supposed to open in the same mode as when it is closed. This is not happening and while not a terrible problem it is annoying to have to resize the display every time I open the program. Nothing I do changes the situation.

Is this a bug in the latest update ?? If not, how do I correct the problem??
creator: j-olivier

title: dove vengono salvati i preferiti di Firefox su MacOS Monterey ?

title: ff not respond after the pc recover from hibernate state
content:
Hello,

When is put the pc to hibernate state (I have 4 windows with lots of pages inside. Well when I came back to my pc from hibernate state the FF is not responding all of pages, windows. Just freeze or something. But the fact is not useble. I need to open task manager to close FF. Reopen and get back to the pages. This problem is still for weeks and not solved any new updates. Just the latests updates has create this bug. Insane! My FF version 103.0.1.

title: crash continui e chiusure improvvise
content:
le ultime versioni di Mozilla non funzionano per nulla, Mozilla va n crash continuamente e si chiude improssivamente, bisogna fare assolutamente qualcosa, sotto l'ultimo crash

https://crash-stats.mozilla.org/report/index/c37e8a0f-7bb2-4334-abc5-eff1c0220802
creator: nicomara65

title: updates!!! almost every single day, sometimes twice a day!
content:
Please oh please diminish the number of updates for firefox developer edition ....

we used to have an update every other month or even once and forever But now it seems firefox is nagging me over updates almost on every time I launch it...

I can understand security patches needd to be installed asap. I do feel however that most updates are little more than bugfixes most of them not even important for me...

please allow me to choose not install those "bugfixes" every single time... or to have it check less often...
creator: krisdevisch

title: 'Securing Website' Failure
content:
On accessing a financial website that I have accessed many times before using firefox, I received a prompt to set up two step authentication (new for this website).

I put in my login details and it gets to a point whener a message is displayed 'securing connection'.

This fails and the site give message that 'it's us not you'. However, using Opera, I was able to login even if having to accept cookies about 6 times.

This may be a firefox issue but I am still thinkign that it coincides with the changes they have made their end for login and using the other browser although I can login I get the odd cooke message behaviour.

Any views wodul be appreciated. Getting through to the right people at the website in question (and indeed any these days) who would analyse this with some basic coding knowledge is almost impossible.
creator: kevin.boardley

title: Firefox freezing
content: I have just booted up my laptop and opened Firefox with three tabs viewing mostly text pages. Firefox has become unresponsive. Task manager shows Firefox running 19 sub tasks using nearly 1GB of Memory... see attached. This has occurred a few times recently, twice when filling online forms which meant having to start the form again from the beginning... infuriating. Is this an issue with the latest version?... I have a 'Congrats., you are using latest version' a couple of days ago. Thanks. Patrick
creator: Riverbank26

title: How can I get rid of the search box in the toolbar?
content: How can I get rid of the search box in the toolbar, I find it unproductive and never use it, I would prefer to use the space for shortcuts that are frequently used. There should also be an option to decrease the size of the toolbar & tabs.
creator: dherrle

title: Assigning a new device ID for Sync after having cloned Firefox settings to another device
content:
Hi,

first of all thank you all in the community for your amazing work on Firefox!


I have cloned my $HOME (including ./.mozilla/firefox/) to another Linux device.

Now I realize that changing the Firefox Sync device name on the new device would also change it for the other device when checking "Connected Services" https://accounts.firefox.com/settings. I also can only see the new device name when using "Send to device" from any device.

I guess I have to unlink my new device and somehow assign it a new device ID for Firefox Sync to recognize the new device. How can I do that?
creator: flightvision

title: Firefox was downloaded at least 40 time (somewhere and I want to know WHERE was it downloaded)  It did not work.
content: Maybe if I uninstalled 40 times one after another, I eventually would clean it up but the question is WHER do I start to uninstall?

creator: mazzocchi.maria

title: ongoing firefox default dl failure
content:
I have noticed for several months now that Firefox NO LONGER downloads to the selected default folder - DOWNLOADS. Evidently this is another area where firefox broke something while fixing something else that likely wasn't broke.

I have the default download folder set to DOWNLOADS but firefox no longer does it that way. Instead, it defaults to the last folder to which I downloaded something and otherwise ignores the default setting.
creator: Rosaliy-Lynne

title: High number of processes for Firefox 102.0.1esr with only one tab; How to reduce
content:
Hi,

I am testing v102esr of Firefox for a rollout in September.

One of this issues I have come across is the extremely high number of processes started when opening Firefox.

We have our own website run via Windows Server using IIS. The home page has no remote content - it's all local so I don't believe any remote content is being opened. There is only one tab open.

For each new tab I open I get at least one additional process. So with 10 tabs opened I ended up with 24 processes.

In FF91esr this was 3-5 processes. I also noticed under performance settings I can no longer specify the number of processes.

Is there any way to reduce this number to something more sane, like 3-5?

Also, why is there a Console Window Host running under Firefox?

Is the Node.js also new? I don't recall seeing it before

thanks
creator: citizen1138x

title: Some videos do not function, nothing I try will work.
content:
Some, but not all, videos on Twitter and tumblr don't function. On tumblr, the audio usually plays but the video is blank. On Twitter, the videos are always stuck loading. Thumbnails always load, there is no way for me to know if a video will work or not without trying to play it.

They work when I use a different browser, and Youtube is fully functional, so it can't be an issue with my laptop. The other person in the house who uses Firefox is able to play the same videos without issue.

I've searched for solutions and exhausted the possibilities in dozens of articles and support sites saying the same things over and over again. I'm at my wit's end.

I've tried: -disabling hardware acceleration -audio and video permissions -clearing cache and cookies -disabling enhanced tracking protection -switching off adblocker -running it in troubleshooting mode -refreshing Firefox

None of these did anything. Can anybody give me even a scrap of an idea as to what I can do?
creator: desperateforanswers

title: Big sessionstore file crashes browser
content: At some moment I´ve got a pretty big sessionstore file (6,6 Mb) which does not load properly. I´ve tried a few of FF versions and settings. My current version 103.0.1 64 bit loads it for few minutes and crashes when tabs appear. Some older versions loads it but after that have various problems with program interface: new tabs sometimes won´t open, no float tips when I´m hove cursor over tab header and so on. Also in such cases browser often crashes and not update old sessionstore file. I have 16 Gb of RAM, FF takes up to 5,5 Gb before tabs appear for moment and FF crashes. I have such big sessionstore file earlier (for example, 24.07.22 it has size of 6,5 Mb), but all worked fine. Maybe there are any internal setting that I have to try?
creator: goblin_online

title: Aba privativa
content: Gostaria de saber sobre o aplicativo orpheus, ele capta sons da internet na aba privativa também vai captar o som?
creator: sergiofaria1962
